alert.note: Alert for Ellis; Henderson; Kaufman; Navarro (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 31 at 1:51PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Kaufman, northwestern Henderson, east central Ellis and northeastern Navarro Counties through 215 PM CDT... At 150 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Alma, or near Ennis, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ennis, Mabank, Tool, Seven Points, Kemp, Trinidad, Bardwell, Grays Prairie, Alma, Bardwell Lake, Flag Lake, Cedar Creek Reservoir, Rice, Emhouse, Chatfield, Telico, Stubbs, Becker, Tolosa and Roane. This includes Interstate 45 between mile markers 236 and 253. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for central and north central Texas.
